title: American Samoa Study Commission Act
content: American Samoa Study Commission Act - Establishes the American Samoa Study Commission which shall: (1) evaluate the history and nature of American Samoa's political relationship with the United States, and determine whether a single document is needed to express such relationship. And (2) evaluate such relationship's economic and social effects on American Samoa. Authorizes appropriations. Terminates the Commission upon submission of a required report.
